EmailTemplate.name: PS Onboarding webinar EM
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Info Regarding ProSeries Onboarding Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you again for your business & for joining the ProSeries team. A critical first step for success is to sign up for a new client services webinar to get your firm setup. These webinars are scheduled for 2 hours. In the first hour, we will share on-boarding information including data conversion.
In the second hour, we will cover return preparation training. Additionally, you will receive an invitation to a 30 minute one-on-one session after attending the webinar. Below is the link to choose the time that best works for you.
Select Your Webinar
Regards, {!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
To unsubscribe or change your email preferences, Click Here.
Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Visit the Ask ProSeries website for fast answers, and contact information for our Service and Support department.
If you receive a suspicious email, please Report It. Visit Security to find out more.
